meanings.definition: A dessert consisting of a layer of sweetened cheese and a crust made of crushed cookies or graham crackers.
meanings.sent1: I love to bake cheesecake for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street makes the best cheesecake in town.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought for a slice of the delicious cheesecake.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a slice of cheesecake on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cheesecake filled the kitchen with joy.

meanings.definition: A photograph of an attractive woman in minimal clothing, often used for titillation.
meanings.sent1: Some magazines feature cheesecake photos to attract readers.
meanings.sent2: The model posed for a cheesecake shot for the fashion magazine.
meanings.sent3: The cheesecake picture made him blush unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence in the cheesecake photo shoot was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The cheesecake image left a lasting impression on the viewers.
